N'afọ 1999, e guzobere Ministry of Women's Affairs and Poverty Alleviation.
Ọ gafere ọtụtụ ọkwa nke nnwogharị tupu ọ ghọọ Ozi.
Na mbụ, ọ bụ Ngalaba Ndị Ntorobịa, Egwuregwu, na Ahụike Ọha nke Ministri Ụmụ nwanyị na Ụmụaka.
Ka e mesịrị, e buliri ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ n'ime Ọfịs Gọvanọ
Site na Decree 42 nke 1992, a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ Otu Ụmụ nwanyị na 1993.
Site n'ike nke Lagos State Official Gazette No
34, nke dị na 22nd March 2001, ọ mechara bụrụ Ministri gọọmenti zuru oke
Kemgbe ahụ, ọrụ ya anọgidewo na-agbasawanye iji tinye ọtụtụ ngalaba steeti.

Ngalaba na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na mkpochapu nke ịda ogbenye na steeti Lagos bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị steeti, nke na-elokọta, na-ahazi ma na-etinye n'ọrụ iwu steeti na ihe gbasara ụmụnwaanyị na mkpochapu nke ịda ogbenye.
E guzobere Lagos State Domestic and Sexual Violence Response Team (DSVRT) ma na-enye ya ikike ịzọpụta na imezigharị ndị na-eme ihe ike n'ụlọ.
Gọọmentị Steeti wepụtakwala ntuziaka steeti megide ime ihe ike n'ụlọ na mmekọahụ
A na-akpọ ya Domestic Violence Protocol for Responder Agencies, a na-emekwa ya iji nye ụlọ ọrụ iwu dị mkpa ma setịpụ ụkpụrụ.
Hon.Cecilia Bolaji Dada batara n'ọkwa dị ka onye kọmíshọna nke ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ibelata ịda ogbenye site n'aka gọvanọ Lagos, Babajide Sanwo-Olu na 20 Ọgọọst 2019.
